+page.server.js
ts
let user;


/** @type {import('./$types').PageServerLoad} */
export function load() {
	return { user };
}


/** @type {import('./$types').Actions} */
export const actions = {
	default: async ({ request }) => {
		const data = await request.formData();


		// NEVER DO THIS!
		user = {
			name: data.get('name'),
			embarrassingSecret: data.get('secret')
		};
	}
}
